post:
Hello Everyone,

Upon a lot of demand from our customers we have decided to stick to our roots and launch our Budget VPS series here in the UK.  We have selected  Hampshire (Gosport), UK via Redstation/ IOMart **[(AS35662)](http://bgp.he.net/AS35662)**  as our network & provider which enables us to come IPv6 ready, provide monstrous bandwidth allocations and a well connected network within the UK.

### Node hardware

-  2x **Intel Xeon E5-2430 2.2Ghz**  (6 Cores / 12 Threads each)
-  96GB DDR3 RAM
-  4x 4TB SATA 7.2K Disks (8TB RAID 10 Storage)
-  H710p Raid Controller /w BBU

We've been using a very similar configuration in our New Jersey location which has been performing flawlessly since being deployed.

## Serverbear Benchmark:

http://serverbear.com/benchmark/2014/02/17/1mUaOoQc2bLbeaV8

There is a limit of 100 Emails a day, we do not encourage mass emailing neither does out datacenter, email traffic should be passed via a Relay in our UK location, one can be provided free with 100 Emails a day or you can opt in for one elsewhere. Sadly this is the only limitations we have on our UK budget series. No policy is in action in NJ however **we do not** appreciate spammers here! :-)

<h2> Not allowed: </h2>
---------------------


- Minecraft
- DDOS Attacs either IN/OUT
- Digital Currency Mining
- Public Proxy / TOR
- Torrents (Personal usage is fine providing you don't hammer the CPU or Disk I/O)
- Illegal Copyright Infringement
- Mass mail / SPAM

Or anything considered illegal within the United stations.

Private VPN's, small usage gameservers (NON MINECRAFT) are fine.
